mapper.select: select count(*) as c from resource where 1=1 and (name_zh like '${name}%' or name_en like '${name}%')

select resource.id,g.name,url,CAST((case pid when -1 then (select max(name) from v_globalization_dictionary where tablename='dictionary' and mkey='RESOURCEPID' and val=resource.pid and language=#{lang}) else (select max(name) from v_globalization_dictionary where tablename='resource' and mkey='RESOURCECODEID' and val=resource.pid and language=#{lang}) end) as char) as pNode, CAST((select max(name) from v_globalization_dictionary where mkey='RESOURCETYPE' and tablename='dictionary' and language=#{lang} and val=resource.type ) as char) as typename,code,sort, CAST((select max(name) from v_globalization_dictionary where mkey='RESOURCEURLTYPE' and tablename='dictionary' and language=#{lang} and val=resource.urltype) as char) as urltype, CAST((select max(name) from v_globalization_dictionary where mkey='ACTIVETYPE' and tablename='dictionary' and language=#{lang} and val=resource.active) as char) as active from resource inner join globalization g on g.tablename='resource' and g.language=#{lang} and g.tableid=resource.id where 1=1
and (name_zh like '${name}%' or name_en like '${name}%')
